Text.Page:
The torturers responsible for the atrocities are grouping near Bloody Depths. Without them, the Citadel of Torment would be a far less frightening place.

You'd improve morale and make us all better off if you could kill the {@LinkCreature:33#67#coalheart} and {@LinkCreature:33#17#ebon inquisitors}, as well as the {@LinkCreature:33#15#mekonari blood mages} who protect them.

Not a small task, but an important one. Let Iorine know when you finish. She'll spread the word.
This reward is not near enough for what you've done, but take it.
We don't fear much, but the torturers are high on the list.
